--- title: fullstream.transforms keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Contains minuit transforms to map from $[-\infty,\infty]$ to a bounded space $[a,b]$ and back." ---

to_bounded_vec(param, bounds)

to_inf_vec[source]

to_inf_vec(param, bounds)

to_inf[source]

to_inf(param, bounds)

p = jax.numpy.asarray([1.0, 1.0])
b = jax.numpy.asarray([jax.numpy.asarray([0.0, 10.0]), jax.numpy.asarray([0.0, 10.0])])

# check if 1 is invariant
cond = inv_transform_lim(transform_lim(p[0], b[0]), b[0])-p[0]
assert not cond

# check if [1,1] is invariant
cond = (inv_transform_lim_vec(transform_lim_vec(p, b), b)-p).any()
assert not cond
